data.name: Olufuwa David
data.techStory: I got into tech via a friend of mine who was interested in opensource, after graduating from college in 2019, i realised that it won't be easy to make some moves and do the dos and don't, incredibly I was able to make my moves and to the Glory of God I finally got into this tech business. Cheeeeeee. I'm a frontend developer familiar with React, Typescript, NextJs and I'm excited to be part of this journey.
